entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
